welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leopoldshöhe, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's culture and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bielefeld Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
